inputUrlsDatasetId.title: Input dataset Id
inputUrlsDatasetId.description: The dataset id containing RequestQueue-like items

outputDatasetId.title: Output dataset
outputDatasetId.description: Optionally pass an output dataset name where all workers can push items

workerTaskId.title: Task Id
workerTaskId.description: Provide the task id instead of actor id

workerInput.title: Actor / Task input
workerInput.description: Additional input to pass to the tasks / actors

workerOptions.title: Actor / Task options
workerOptions.description: Options to pass to the tasks / actors

workerCount.title: Worker count
workerCount.description: How many instances should be spawned
